title: viLaiyADalE ulagam
sahitya:
viLaiyADalE ulagam adil iru vinaiyAlE varum kalagam manamE


anupallavi

  uLaiyAda jnAnigaL uNarvAr idan cETTai uLLiyai urittiDin uLLE loDaloTTai


caraNam    nAnenrOr Anavam nAnArUpamAik-kATTum nalladum polladum allal sheidE vATTum
tAnenrezhunduLLE sAKSiyAm pashupati sATTai kaTTi ATTum shakti vilAsamAm
